Anthropologie.description: Offers a wide range of bohemian-style furniture, decor, and accessories.

Urban Outfitters.description: Features a selection of boho-inspired furniture, textiles, and home decor items.

World Market.description: Specializes in eclectic and bohemian-style furniture, decor, and international goods.

Bohemian Mama.description: Offers a curated collection of boho-chic furniture and lifestyle products.

Lulu & Georgia.description: Showcases a variety of stylish boho furniture and decor pieces.

The Citizenry.description: Features artisanal boho-inspired furniture, textiles, and decor items.

Jungalow.description: Offers a range of vibrant and eclectic boho decor and furniture.

Opalhouse.description: Available at Target, Opalhouse offers a variety of bohemian-style furniture and decor.

Society6.description: Showcases boho-inspired art prints, wall decor, and home accessories.
